attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am concerned that people are not left alone to live freely due to the amount of Pesting that some people do to them. By Pesting I mean that people are harassed by a Pest while they go about their business at work or at home. It should be illegal to be a Pest which infringes on the lives of others. I urge the Prime Minister make Pesting an illegal offence whether at home or at work.

rejection.details: There are already laws in place to prevent harrassment.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
